name: The Home Base
description:
Story

You're a curious investigator of the USA, you've solved many cases, yet your curiosity has let you down many times, one day you hear some rumors about the Area 51 and decided it was an opportunity you couldn't waste; you head there and somehow manage to bypass the security and get to the base, just to find out all of it was fake, while you struggle with disappointment you try to get out of the place, not as lucky as when you got in you are discovered and an alarm sounds, hangar doors all around opened and war planes came out as they started throwing bombs at you, try to survive as long as you can or be the victim of your own bad habits.

 

How to Play

Jump with the X key or the B button, use the X button on the phone.

Spin Jump with Up and X key or B button, use the O button on the phone

Move with the Arrow Keys or the Left Stick, use the D-Pad on the phone

You can play in Windows, MacOS, Linux, Raspberry Pi, browsers and even in the phone!

For information about enemies and items consult the info section inside the game
